newsitem.title: USA: Coffee retention indicator price 99.52 - Aug 21.
newsitem.headline: Coffee retention indicator price 99.52 - Aug 21.

text.p: The Association of Coffee Producing Countries Retention Plan Coordination Bureau quoted the following daily indicator prices:
Arabica: 99.52 cents a lb 99.17 cents a lb
Robusta: 77.16 cents a lb 76.90 cents a lb
Note: the following retention rules apply to ACPC members:
ARABICA (in US cents/lb based on ICA composite 79)
165 cts or less - 20 percent exports retained
190 cts or above - release from stocks
ROBUSTA (in cts/lb ICO Robusta 20-day moving average)
135 cts or less - 20 percent exports retained
160 cts or above - release from stocks
